The Italian ambassador has recently informed us of his government’s decision to nullify the Treaty of Venice which legitimized Austrian rule over Venice and other Italian speaking lands. This marks an end to Austro-Italian friendship. War is most likely on the horizon.

The monarchy of Brazil has fled Rio, allowing pro-democracy forces to seize the capital and transform the country into a republic. It would seem are ideals of liberty our spreading throughout the New World.

Mexico has refused to submit to our protection citing sovereignty over solidarity. Truly they are traitors to the cause of anti-imperialism. This is obviously the work of foreign agents in their government and the only reasonable course of action is a swift invasion straight towards Mexico City to oust the tyrants. The corrupt politicians will most likely run to their masters in the United States for protection.

After the successful purchase of the Maritimes, New England is once again attempting to purchase new land. Boston hopes to incorporate all lands east of the St. Lawrence River. Considering the large French speaking population that resides in these areas, it certainly would be a burden off our shoulders for them to be a nuisance to someone else.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has refused to sell us all lands east of the St. Lawrence river. New England might need to seize the land by force.

Through diplomatic manoeuvring, we can force independent countries within our sphere to return lands which are rightfully ours. After taking our cores from one of our sphered countries, we will lose all influence in that country, and the relations between our two states will be severely damaged. Also, to avoid any map on the mess should all a country’s cores be our cores as well, then we will be completely annexing the country along with their un-cored lands. While this is a preferable alternative to war, some see this as nothing more than backstabbing our allies and would rather have this tactic done away with.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ owns lands that should be rightfully under our control. Through diplomatic pressure and threats of military action, we can force $FROMCOUNTRY$ to surrender any $COUNTRY_ADJ$ cores.
Our recently conquered territory has been fully integrated into our administration.
Territorial Integration
Excellent.

The unfortunate rebellion has left our administration in the gutter in Parliament’s mind and a bill has recently passed liquidating the company, they now seek to seize all of our holdings for the Crown.
Let’s see them try it!
We will abide by their wishes.
The East India Company, run by fools as always has refused to the changing of hands of their holdings, for the good of the common Indian we must remove them by force.
The Company Refuses.
So be it then.

In the aftermath of the Sepoy Rebellion, under the provisions of the Government of India Act $YEAR$, the British Government nationalised the Company and thus the Crown took over its Indian possessions, its administrative powers and machinery, and its armed forces. The era of Company rule in India has come to an end. 
 
 It accomplished a work such as in the whole history of the human race no other trading Company ever attempted, and such as none, surely, is likely to attempt in the years to come. 
 
 —The Times
The Company Agrees
Excellent.

The British armies have been sent packing and we are now free to do with India as we see fit, our shareholders have moved to Calcutta and all of our affairs our strictly our own. Our forces have seized all British territory in Asia apart from Australia and New Zealand and all Princely states will be pressured to accept our suzerainty. \n \n The former Governor-General James Andrew Broun-Ramsay, The Earl of Dalhousie, will be henceforth be crowned as Emperor Ramsay, the Honourable Emperor of the East Indian Empire. This is a glorious day!
The End of British India
Glorious!

The East India Company has defeated the British government and has asserted their rule of India an independent state. The company has restyled itself as $FROMCOUNTRY$ with the former Governor-General of India crowning himself as the ‘Honourable Emperor of the East Indies’ and has demanded that the former princely states under British influence now recognize $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ suzerainty in India.
The British Crown Defeated
A dark day…
We shall declare our independence from British rule!

Recent events in Calcutta have undermined the East India Company’s loyalty to the Crown in matters of trade and the British monopoly on Indian goods is in danger, swift action must be taken to mend this.
This is the End.
Parliament is understandably displeased with our recent change in policy and they now seek to undermine our rights and liquidate the company, clearly it is time for us to re-evaluate our loyalties.
The End of the East India Company
Let’s see them try it!
We will abide by their wishes.
A Ship has arrived in Calcutta today carrying some delightful fruits of British ingenuity, we must put it to use straight away.
A New Toy
Though we initially declined their demands the granting of another entity sub-national institutions has fanned the flames, refusing again would mean war.
A New Toy
Neat!
The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have remained defiant and have declared independence from both foreign rule altogether! We must respond to this act immediately!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has refused $COUNTRY_ADJ$ suzerainty!
Unruly vassals must be put in their place!

British soldiers employed under the East India Company have refused to take up arms against their mother country, and have sided with the British crown! They have taken control of the Bombay and Gujarat with the help of Native regiments resenting company rule in India.
Disloyal Soldiers in Bombay!
A mere setback.
British Warships have arrived and landed troops in Ceylon and have seized the island, placing it under their control
British Warships Seize Ceylon!
Ceylon will be ours again!

The Norman crown stands at the end of its golden age, defeated 20 years ago in the Grand Coalition it has been stripped of the title Holy Roman Emperor and much of its influence. Burgundy, once a province is now a nation. The Archduke of Guyenne, once a loyal vassal now pursues his own interests and the boards of the great trading companies of the east now serve no master aside from profits. Though Normandy is still a great power, perhaps the greatest, this sense of decline has lifted the spirits of nationalists on both sides of the channel. This is the dawning of a new age and only time will tell if it belongs to Normandy as the last did.
BLOOD AND THUNDER!

Lombardia has long stood in the shadow of Normandy, though with the aftermath of the Grand Coalition it appears ready to step into the light. Once more the crown of the Holy Roman Empire sits in Milan and while we have pledged to respect the independence of the heretics in Rome stewardship of the city passing from Normandy to the Knights brings the unification of Italy one step closer.

The last 50 years have been disastrous for the Badajozi Caliphate, economic ruin and the loss of the colonies bringing instability and civil war to the motherland. For a time, Iberia was the battleground of the greater powers, throwing more men and more chaos behind causes they had no real support for. However, with the death of the Norman Emperor on our soil the chaos gradually subsided and the Caliph has once again restored order, the time is ripe for Badajoz to rise again.

Though founded as a tool of the Norman crown the Archduchy of Guyenne has grown into a great power of its own since freed in the aftermath of the Grand Coalition and stands poised to achieve great things in its own name, the colony of Nou Provence is thriving and traders ply the Indian routes. Viua Guyenne!

Though similar in many ways to other European nations most would say things are fundamentally different in Ireland, the great religions of Christianity and Islam never took hold and the people stick to their ancient traditions. Despite this they have spread to lands far and wide, and the Irish colonial empire was among the world’s finest, today all that remains is a few stray islands and ports but the adventuring spirit has never left the isle.

Estonia sits in an uncomfortable position as of late, sandwiched between hostile heathen neighbours to the south and growing Scandinavian and Russian ambitions, of those options Scandinavian rule would be most preferable and with our strong cultural ties to them perhaps a union on favourable terms could be arranged?

An Estonian envoy arrived today with a most tempting offer, the cession of Estonian territory and sovereignty to us in exchange for a set of local rights and freedoms and guarantees of protection for the Estonian language. Only one question remains, is Estonia Scandinavian?

Our glorious republic has come into its own as of late, born through fire 50 years ago we now stand as the bastion of liberty and freedom in the world. Our people prosper and though divided by language and religion they remain united by revolutionary ideals. Many have begun trekking west into land loosely governed by the Knights and the glimmers of a great nation stretching from sea to sea can be seen forming. Let us liberate our brothers under the Norman yoke and rule this land in the name of freedom!

We stand at the deciding moment of what will surely go down as world changing debate, many voices among the senior knights have pointed to the massive settlement of Arabs from the east coast in our lands to say that our long standing policies to convert, educate and ultimately protect the natives are now pointless, that we must now more than ever use the bounties of the new world to secure a homeland for Christian Greeks. Others claim that that same Arab migration merely cements the need for our missionary work. Whichever argument proves more persuasive the consequences for the future of this land will be great.

Though successful in our quest to establish a modern state at the expense of the colonial powers the challenge of building a nation is far from over and the many native peoples of our lands are slow to accept the French language and modern ideals given to us by the Knights. Nonetheless the seeds of a great civilization to rival that of the Ancient Greeks or Romans have been planted.

The greatest hero of the revolution and Lord Protector in its final days, Lajos Batthyany has returned from exile in Corfu to the rousing applause of thousands, already soldiers flock to his banner and the rabble pronounce the return of the revolution. The situation may already be beyond our control.

Though once the mightiest of all Christian powers our fine Scandinavian nation has only now recovered from the long rape at the hands of Norman and Italian armies. There are no more burnt villages or salted fields, instead only abandoned ones as we sit and watch others surpass us by the fruit of their people’s labour. However, our greatest weakness may in time become a strength as the downtrodden of Europe look at us as a land of freedom and opportunity close to home.

For too long the world has sat idly by and watched itself decay, our ‘Christian brothers’ to the west bicker among themselves about popery and sugar colonies as the Mohhamedan hordes sweep all in their path aside unopposed. However, a rumble can be heard in the distance, a rumble of change and hope for the oppressed Slavs of the world, the rumble of the Russian Bear about to wake. Tver is abuzz with expectation as talk of Russian unification, eastern expansion and the rescue of our Ukrainian brothers from their self-imposed exile in sin sweep the town, let us not fail those expectations.

Though Germanic in blood and language it is safe to say that Prussia belongs to the east far more than the west, first introduced by the Lithuanian horde Islam has planted itself as firmly on the Baltic coast as it has in Iberia. Where in other German towns church bells would ring in the day in Königsberg instead the Muezzin calls all to prayer. Nonetheless German nationalism, a significant force since the Grand Coalition has found a home here and a lively debate has emerged on what place Germany has in Islam, and Islam in Germany.
We have failed to spread the revolution to our neighbours

In a surprise election win, the communists have taken power in the government-despite the fact that their party opposes the monarchy and has been banned. Regardless, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people have spoken, and thus a political showdown has resulted: the communists cannot be permitted to win, but even if they’re refused the next election might simply have the same crisis occur all over again. Perhaps the time has come to reconsider electoral reforms and put the power back where it belongs?
This cannot be allowed. The Liberals shall rule instead.
This cannot be allowed. The Conservatives shall rule instead.
This cannot be allowed. The Socialists shall rule instead.
Enough is enough. The people clearly cannot be trusted to do what is best for $COUNTRY$.

In a surprise election win, the radicals have taken power in the government-despite the fact that their party opposes the monarchy and has been banned. Regardless, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people have spoken, and thus a political showdown has resulted: these radical republicans cannot be permitted to win, but even if they’re refused the next election might simply have the same crisis occur all over again. Perhaps the time has come to reconsider electoral reforms and put the power back where it belongs?
You’re the worst scum of the earth and you deserve what’s coming for you
Infamy Limit Violated!
I’m a naughty, naughty boy!

With our holdings on the mainland lost, all we have left is our stronghold on the island of Taiwan. The suggestion among what little remains of the Kuomintang government is that we abandon $CAPITAL$ and move the capital to Taipei. This does not guarantee our safety by any means, but it may be the only means of survival we possess. We shall however never relinquish our rightful claim to the mainland.
Retreat to Taiwan
It seems we have little choice.

With their armies defeated, their provinces occupied and their government retreating to Taiwan it has become clear that the Kuomintang no longer has the will to fight. We may now claim dominance over China.
Victory over the Kuomintang
Victory is ours!
$COUNTRY$ has been overrun. We must face the fact that we have lost the civil war and surrender.
$COUNTRY$ Is Lost
A dark day.
The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ soldiers have laid down their arms.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Surrenders
Excellent.
We have been engaged in a civil war that seems to go nowhere. Our people demand a rest.
The Civil War Drags On
The war with $FROMCOUNTRY$ appears to be going nowhere. Should we lay down our arms?
Truce With $FROMCOUNTRY$?
Indeed.

Similarly, to guberniyas of the autonomous Grand Duchy of Finland, the Baltic Governorates were not a subject to the common civil and administrative laws of the Russian Empire, but did not have monetary, fiscal and passport system of their own. Like guberniyas of the Kingdom of Poland they were treated as an integral entity and the Russian law provided them the preservation of local authorities. In the Baltics these were Landtags. The special legislation which set rules for municipal administration and entrepreneurship according to local traditions, as well as the privileges to the local nobility, usually German, in the Baltics was known under the collective name of Ostsee Right. Now that we are free from the Russians, the question remains about the future of our country and if it will remain united at all.
The Future of the United Baltic Provinces
The Union will continue with Latvian rule.
The Union will continue with Estonian rule.
The Union will continue with the status quo.
Latvia will be released and we will declare Estonia free.
Estonia will be released and we will declare Latvia free.
The next step in the formation of the New African autonomous region is establishing its borders. There are three possibilities of varying sizes, each larger than the last.
Our planning and funding have proven to be fruitful as a small slave revolt has erupted in $FROMCOUNTRY$. We should act quickly to intervene on behalf of New Africa in their fight for independence.

A small slave revolt has erupted in a province in the southern states. The insurgency is likely to spread to nearby plantations in neighbouring provinces, and we should act quickly to put down the uprising before it does too much damage to our economy. Furthermore, the Free States of America has officially recognized the burgeoning government formed by the rebellious slaves, and there exists the possibility that they might intervene.
Our planning and funding have proven to be fruitful as a massive slave revolt has erupted in $FROMCOUNTRY$. We should act quickly to intervene on behalf of New Africa in their fight for independence.
The slave revolt is quickly spreading from plantation to plantation. Soon, nearby provinces will join us in our fight for independence.
The recent slave revolt has spread to $PROVINCENAME$. There are reports of roaming bands of slaves setting plantations aflame and massacring entire communities.
We have received our supplies from the Free States of America. We will immediately begin distributing weapons and mobilizing our forces into a proper fighting force.
We have received our supplies from the Free States of America. We will immediately begin distributing weapons and mobilizing our forces into a proper fighting force.

Several candidate cities would serve as suitable locations for the new capital of New Africa. Located in the along the Louisiana coast, New Orleans has long been the cultural capital of the country. Montgomery’s central location would make it an appropriate city for the capital to be seated, and its small size allows for some room to develop. Lastly, Atlanta is one of the largest cities in New Africa and is the economic heart of the country.

In 1831, Nat Turner led a slave rebellion in Virginia that was composed of more than 70 slaves and resulted in the death of 60 white people, including women and children. After Nat Turner was captured and the rebellion ended, over a hundred slaves were massacred in retaliation. For many in New Africa, Nat Turner represents the heroism and determination needed to fight such a brutal system like slavery. However, whites in the country perceive Nat Turner as a violent murderer. With the 100th Anniversary of the rebellion closely approaching, there is mounting pressure on the government on how to remember such a cataclysmic event and such a complicated man.

New Africa is currently experiencing a cultural renaissance emanating out of $CAPITAL$. Across the country, new works of literature are being published, new music genres are being defined, and new plays for the theatre are being written. Innovations are also occurring in the philosophical and academic fields leading to an explosion in fresh perspectives and new knowledge. Artists and intellectuals from across the world have taken notice of this reawakening of the New Africa spirit.

Soon after its establishment, the New African government founded the National Underground Railroad Institute. While its official public function is to assist with the settlement of escaped slaves into New Africa, the Institute, as suggested by its less than subtle name, secretly works with abolitionists to help slaves escape bondage from the American South and flee to New Africa. There are also rumours that the Institute funds and organizes slave revolts
FRENCH: however, the Institute denies such accusations.

ENGLISH: With slavery no longer the menace it once was, The National Underground Railroad Institute no longer has a purpose and as such as has been officially closed. The headquarters of the Institute will be converted into a museum so future generations may learn of the courageous actions Institute conductors undertook in the name of liberty.

New Africa is a nation of free people who once endured systematic violence and forced servitude. Now that the racial hierarchy of power has inverted, those that once sat at the top are resentful of their current low standing. As such, racial tensions are high in provinces that lack a black majority.

Due to the lack of a black majority, $PROVINCENAME$ is experiencing significant racial tensions that will only subside as more African Americans and other accepted cultures settle in the area. This unrest will most likely spread throughout White majority provinces.

As racial demographics shift in $PROVINCENAME$, once notable and disruptive racial tensions have faded into the background. Other provinces that have experienced similar population changes should also calm down.

A man of both African and Indian heritage, John Horse fought alongside Seminole tribes against the United States Army during the Second Seminole War. He garnered a reputation as a skilled scout and talented negotiator, and Horse soon became a prominent leader among the Seminole people. After New Africa passed the Seminole Act, which integrated Indian tribes in Florida, John Horse offered his service and expertise to the army of New Africa.

In $YEAR$ onboard the brig Creole, Madison Washington, an enslaved cook, led his fellow slaves in a revolt against their captors who were transporting them to an American slave market. After killing the ship’s captain, they seized control of the vessel. Although they were initially planning to sail for Nassau, they have instead arrived at a New African port. The most apparent course of action is to welcome Washington and the other slaves as heroes. However, doing so will undoubtedly enrage the United States, which would accuse New Africa of harbouring criminals.

Uncle Remus: His Songs and His Sayings is a collection of African American folktales that author Joel Chandler Harris recalled from his childhood on his family’s plantation in Georgia. Although New Africa has since liberated Georgia, many Southern whites, like Harris, still hold on dearly to their memories during the time of slavery, and as such, Harris’s book has quickly become a best-seller and favourite among the white community in New Africa. However, the character of Uncle Remus has received a very mixed reaction from black New Africans. While it is impossible to ignore the rich collection of folklore Harris has been able to compile, there are many, especially among the intellectual class, who are critical of what they believe to be a romanticizing of slavery and accuse Harris of cultural theft. The New African government can either curtail the distribution of Harris’s work or allow it circulate openly.

Born into bondage in 1818, Fredrick Douglass escaped slavery at a young age and fled from Maryland to New Africa. He has quickly gained notoriety for his skill as an orator and controversy for his staunch support of racial and gender equality. While most in New Africa view him as the country’s most important statesman, few entirely embrace his radical proposal for the greater social and political integration of whites in New Africa. However, his most recent publication, A Narrative of New Africa, has enticed many New Africans into his Equality Party and led to an increased acceptance of the notion for greater equality among the races.

The legend of John Henry is the tale of one man with raw strength and incredible endurance beating a steam-powered machine in a competition to drill a tunnel through a mountain. Although where precisely this competition occurred and whether if such a man even existed is debatable, there is no denying that John Henry has become an inspiring symbol of the industrial New African man. Additionally, his hammer-wielding image has become closely associated with socialist parties and trade unions, especially those composed of railway workers.

Prominent academic and founder of the Tuskegee Institute Booker T. Washington has always been known as a moderate voice in New African politics, and he frequently opposes war waged at the expense of various domestic reforms, especially those related to education. Washington recently gave a speech to a large crowd in $CAPITAL$. In the speech, he called for the development of greater respect and the reduction of tensions between whites and blacks in New Africa. Furthermore, Washington argued for better relations between New Africa and the United States and proposed a compromise in which New Africa would cease territorial expansion into the American South in return for an increase in trade and protection from the United States.

Before beginning to plan, we must decide how much money and supplies to devote to the revolt. The more funds we commit, the more likely of a large revolt erupting. If we only invest a small amount, then there is a lower chance of a successful revolt.

Ever since our declaration of independence, our borders with the neighbouring Brazilians have not been delineated through any treaty. The resident minister of Brazil in $COUNTRY$, Enéas Martins, is on a special mission in $CAPITAL$, to meet with the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Alfredo Vásquez Cobo, to delineate a treaty to settle the border issue. The treaty would establish the border from the Rio Negro north-westward along the Amazon River-Orinoco watershed divide, then generally southward along various river courses and straight-line segments to the mouth of the Apaporis River. This would effectively mean the Marabitanas province will end up part of Brazil, though signing the treaty can positively affect our image internationally.
The García Ortiz-Mangabeira Treaty
Let this be a sign of friendship and cooperation between our countries.
We will never cede an inch of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ territory.

The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government is holding talks in the Brazilian city of Petrópolis to end tensions over the territory known as Acre. Claimed by multiple countries and without a clear border demarcation, several incursions of foreigners from neighbouring countries searching for rubber sparked a few incidents and the de facto owner of the territory, $COUNTRY$, is now offering us monetary compensation, a friendship treaty as well as the possibility of funding a railway construction in our country in exchange for us dropping any claims we have over the area.
The Treaty of Petrópolis
Sounds like a good deal, we agree.
No, Acre is a rightful part of $COUNTRY$.

In the aftermath of the War of the Pacific, Peru was defeated and forced to sign the Treaty of Ancón. In this Treaty, Tarapacá was annexed to Chile. However, the fate of both Tacna and Arica was to be decided by a plebiscite to be held in 1893. Due to different points of view, both countries were not able to agree on the conditions of this plebiscite and so it was not held. Chile began then to colonize the two territories and Peru answered with a break of diplomatic relations. In $YEAR$, Chile and Peru agreed to arbitrate the dispute with the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$. The commission on the issue of who Tacna belongs to was formed and now the only thing that remains is their final decision.
The Tacna-Arica Arbitration
Tacna belongs to Peru.

One of the main reasons that led to the Kraków Uprising spreading to our polish lands is the serfdom question. Modern nations already abolished this medieval institution that persists in our country, and many in our country advise that it’s now the time to modernize $COUNTRY$, and the first step is the abolition of serfdom. The question remains, however, to who belongs the lands the serfs worked on. The aristocracy claims the land is theirs and the serfs should find their own lands, while the serfs argue that the land is theirs by the right of use.
The Serfdom Question
Give the lands to the freed serfs.
The land belongs to the aristocracy.
Distribute the lands to the serfs, but pay a compensation to the nobility.
This is not the time to abolish serfdom.

The Austro-Hungarian Compromise brought other consequences regarding to the legal status of the sovereignty of the Crown of St. Stephen over other crown lands. An agreement was reached between the Parliament of Hungary on the one hand and the Parliament of Croatia on the other hand, with regard to composing by a joint enactment the constitutional questions at issue between them. Following the Settlement, the Croatian kingdom was referred to using the name Kingdom of Croatia-Slavonia and article 66 of the settlement specified lands of the Kingdom of Croatia-Slavonia, including Dalmatia in the list.
The Croatian-Hungarian Settlement
At least this issue is settled.

Diplomats of $FROMCOUNTRY$ approached us with a friendship and border treaty to settle outstanding issues between the perceived territory of our two countries. The treaty would include population exchanges, border delimitation and a treaty of friendship. If we sign this deal it will also show the world our will to settle issues diplomatically and our government respect of the will of the people.
The $COUNTRY_ADJ$—$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Border Treaty
This sounds like a good idea.
No deal.

Bullets whistled as the morning came in $PROVINCENAME$. Enemy soldiers engaged our troops in the roads, their drums roaring in the distance. Our local fort was spearheading the defence, soldiers taking turns crouching to reload and standing up to fire at the enemies. A group of enemy saboteurs snuck in one of the fort walls and managed to blew it up with explosives, severely damaging the fort’s structure.
$PROVINCENAME$ Fort Damaged
We shall rebuild.

A locomotive hurriedly passed by the $PROVINCENAME$ railroad during dusk while human silhouettes snuck out of the railroad. They hit the wooden keys used to hold the rails in chairs with a hammer, diverting the train to a more sinuous track while forward other figures moved objects in the rail. The train was wrecked by putting objects on the high rail at a curve, and contained tons of supplies for our troops fighting in the province. Later that night, one of our railroad bridges in $PROVINCENAME$ was burned to the ground, with no culprits found. These actions are believed to be the work of the enemy and severely crippled our railroad network.
Sabotage in $PROVINCENAME$
A minor setback.

Reports came in today that street lights and lines in $PROVINCENAME$ have been badly damaged during the skirmishes that happened with enemy troops. Lines and poles have been hit by artillery fire, damaged by bullets or had the supply purposely cut, the poles dug and knocked down in an attempt to turn the fight in their favour and hide their position.
$PROVINCENAME$ Goes Dark

However, Romanians are the majority population of much of Transylvania, and therefore, we could support Romanian self-determination. It is unlikely either of these proposals would be warmly welcomed by the losing party. Therefore, we could also suggest a partitioning of Transylvania.

We must remain Neutral!

At 11:40 p.m. an iceberg was spotted immediately ahead of the Titanic and the bridge was alerted. The First Officer ordered the ship to be steered around the obstacle and the engines to be put in reverse, but it was too late: the starboard side struck the iceberg, creating a series of holes below the waterline. Five of the ship’s watertight compartments were breached. It soon became clear that the ship was doomed, as it could not survive more than four compartments being flooded. It began sinking bow-first, with water spilling from compartment to compartment as its angle in the water became steeper. Ships in $YEAR$ were seen as largely unsinkable and lifeboats were intended to transfer passengers to nearby rescue vessels so Titanic only had enough lifeboats to carry about half of those on board. More than 1500 people died, the biggest toll in history. The disaster was greeted with worldwide shock and outrage at the huge loss of life and the regulatory and operational failures that had led to it.
Titanic Sinks!
Our nation mourns those who died.

The Titanic—the biggest ocean liner ever built—has successfully reached its destination, where a crowd gathers to watch the massive ship anchor. Thousands of happy passengers pour down from the ship and in a new land as tales of the ship luxury and quality spread throughout the world. Undoubtedly, $COUNTRY_ADJ$ name will be forever remembered in history for this feat.
Titanic Maiden Voyage a Success
A glorious day to our nation.

The Tangier Protocol, formally known as the Convention regarding the Organization of the Statute of the Tangier Zone, is a diplomatic proposal over the fate of Sultan of Morocco and Tangier brought forward by the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government. The proposal is to create a 373-square-kilometre international zone centred on the city of Tangier, North Africa under the joint administration of the signatory countries, with the Sultan of Morocco retaining sovereignty over the zone and jurisdiction over the native population. Tangier is to be made a neutral demilitarized zone so it will solve disagreements between the great powers on who should control it.
The Tangier Protocol
We agree to the proposal.
It doesn’t suit our interests.

In $YEAR$, the great powers of Europe assembled together on the initiative of $COUNTRY$ and decided the fate of Morocco and its sultan with the Tangier Protocol. It was decided that a 373-square-kilometre international, neutral and demilitarized zone centred on the city of Tangier was to be created. The sultan of Morocco was given sovereignty and jurisdiction over the native population. Thus, the great powers hoped that the current conflicts over Morocco would end.
The Tangier International Zone
The Sultan shall reign once more.

However, negotiations broke down and no consensus could be reached. There are doubts if the proposal was outright reject, if it couldn’t find enough supporters or if it was shelved but the fact remains that the Tangier Protocol is dead in the water, a great blow to $COUNTRY_ADJ$ diplomacy.
The Tangier Protocol Fails
A waste of diplomatic effort.

We, however, currently hold Tangier and the great powers are urging us to abide to the Convention’s decision.
We will abide.
